data.prayer: Over 98.72 percent of the people of Rann of Kutch are far from Jesus. Lord, please send your gospel to them through the internet or radio or television today!

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Rann of Kutch, Sind, Pakistan
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Spirit, give the disciples of the the county of Rann of Kutch words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.prayer: Father, please raise up prophets in Rann of Kutch who can call the church to holiness and purity, preparing your church as a bride for your Son.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Jesus, remind the disciples in the county of Rann of Kutch to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Bharbhunja (Muslim traditions) people. Make the Bharbhunja (Muslim traditions) people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Father, you desire the people in the county of Rann of Kutch who are far from you to hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.prayer: Spirit, supernaturally prepare encounters with the gospel on sites like Facebook and Instagram for the 5,638,700 people living in Rann of Kutch.
Spirit, awaken the sleepers and call them to repent and be baptized in the county of Rann of Kutch. Set an urgency in their hearts.
data.verse: And now why do you wait? Rise and be baptized and wash away your sins, calling on his name.’

location.name: Rann of Kutch
